trans-unit.source: Abstract base class to be implemented by all text to speech synthesis engines.
trans-unit.target: Abstrakt basisklasse implementeres av alle tekst til tale syntese motorer.

trans-unit.source: To construct a custom text to speech engine, an application must always implement a class derived from the abstract base class TtsEngineSsml.
trans-unit.target: Et program må implementere en klasse som er utledet fra abstrakt basisklasse TtsEngineSsml alltid for å lage en egendefinert tekst til tale-motor.

trans-unit.source: A properly registered implementation of TtsEngineSsml can then be used as a `Synthesizer``Voice` by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> name space based applications.
trans-unit.target: En riktig registrert implementering av TtsEngineSsml kan brukes som en `Synthesizer``Voice` av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>navneområde-baserte programmer.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>

trans-unit.source: Objects inheriting from TtsEngineSsml must override the following members: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Objekter arving fra TtsEngineSsml må overstyre følgende medlemmer: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most important member of the TtsEngineSsml class to be implemented is the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: De viktigste medlemmet av klassen TtsEngineSsml implementeres er den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method is called by the infrastructures text parser receiving: 1.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>-metoden av mottak infrastrukturer teksten analysen: 1.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface, which provides access to system services such as even queuing and writing audio output.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>grensesnittet som gir tilgang til systemtjenester som selv queuing og skriving lyd utdata.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance produced from Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) input.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>forekomsten gav tale syntese Markup Language (SSML) inndata.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: In addition to text to be rendered as speech, the parsing of the SSML stores information about the requested attributes of the speech in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance associated with each incoming <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> object.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til teksten som skal gjengis som tale, analyse av SSML inneholder informasjon om de forespurte attributtene for tale i en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>forekomst som er knyttet til hver innkommende <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>

trans-unit.source: A speech synthesizer application can optionally make requests for a specified output format by implementing <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> to be called by the platform when it tries to provide the correct audio output.
trans-unit.target: Et tale synthesizer program kan eventuelt gjøre forespørsler for et angitt utdata-format ved å implementere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>kalles av plattformen når den prøver å angi riktig lyd utdataene.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: An implementer can also provide support for managing external definitions of pronunciations, or lexicons, by their implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En implementer kan også gir støtte for administrasjon av eksterne definisjoner av uttaler eller lexicons, av implementeringen av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> based on an appropriate Voice Token registry key.
trans-unit.target: Bygger en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> basert på en riktig registernøkkel stemme Token.

trans-unit.source: Full name of the registry key for the Voice Token associated with the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Fullt navn for registernøkkelen for stemme-Token knyttet til den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> implementering.

trans-unit.source: engine.
trans-unit.target: motoren.

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""></xref> implemented by the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et leksikon til den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""> </xref> implementeres av gjeldende <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations specified using an appropriate pronunciation alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Et uttale leksikon er en samling av ord eller uttrykk sammen med sin uttaler angitt ved hjelp av en passende uttale alfabetet.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called by the platform infrastructure in response to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications calling AddLexicon and using the `Synthesizer``Voice` implemented by the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles vanligvis av plattformen-infrastruktur som svar på en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>-baserte programmer kaller AddLexicon og bruke den `Synthesizer``Voice` implementeres av gjeldende <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>

trans-unit.source: The value of `mediaType` is typically a MIME specification, as the SSML specification uses MIME for media specifications.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for `mediaType` er vanligvis en MIME-spesifikasjon som spesifikasjonen SSML bruker MIME for media spesifikasjonene.

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""></xref> indicating the location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: En gyldig forekomst av <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""> </xref> som angir plasseringen av leksikon-informasjon.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: En streng med medietypen for leksikon.

trans-unit.source: Media types are case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Medietyper er bokstaver.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> interface used to interact with the platform infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til en <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> grensesnitt som brukes til å kommunisere med plattformen-infrastruktur.

trans-unit.source: Returns the best matching audio output supported by a given synthesize engine response to a request to the synthesizer engine for the support of a particular output format.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer best samsvarende lyd utdata som støttes av en gitt synthesize motoren svar på en forespørsel til synthesizer motoren til støtte for et bestemt output-format.

trans-unit.source: The structure used as `targetWaveFormat` and returned by the method should compatible with the `WAVEFORMATEX` available under SAPI, and the returned value should be allocated using `CoTaskMemAlloc`.
trans-unit.target: Strukturen som brukes som `targetWaveFormat` og returnert av metoden skal kompatibel med den `WAVEFORMATEX` tilgjengelig under uspesifiserte ISAPI, og den returnerte verdien skal tilordnes ved hjelp av `CoTaskMemAlloc`.

trans-unit.source: The `struct` must provide functionality equivalent to: ``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```
trans-unit.target: Den `struct` må angi funksjonalitet tilsvarer:``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```

trans-unit.source: Valid member of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat"></xref> enumeration indicating the type of requested audio output format.
trans-unit.target: Gyldig medlem av den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat"> </xref> opplisting som angir forespurte lyd utdataene format.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""></xref> containing detail setting for the audio format type requested by the `speakOutputFormat` argument.
trans-unit.target: En peker til en <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""> </xref> som inneholder detaljer innstilling for typen formatet som ble forespurt av den `speakOutputFormat` argumentet.

trans-unit.source: Returns a valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> instance referring to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""></xref> containing detailed information about the output format.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et gyldig <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> forekomsten refererer til en <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""> </xref> med detaljert informasjon om output-format.

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon currently loaded by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""></xref> implemented by the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner et leksikon som er lastet inn av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""> </xref> implementeres av gjeldende <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations specified using an appropriate pronunciation alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Et uttale leksikon er en samling av ord eller uttrykk sammen med sin uttaler angitt ved hjelp av en passende uttale alfabetet.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called in response to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> and using the `Synthesizer``Voice` implemented by the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles vanligvis som svar på en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>-baserte programmer kaller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>og bruke den `Synthesizer``Voice` implementeres av gjeldende <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""></xref> indicating the location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: En gyldig forekomst av <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""> </xref> som angir plasseringen av leksikon-informasjon.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til en <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> grensesnittet sendt inn av plattformen-infrastruktur for å gi tilgang til ressurser infrastruktur.

trans-unit.source: Renders specified <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> array in the specified output format.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir angitt <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> matrise i det angitte output-formatet.

trans-unit.source: The structure used as `waveHeader` and returned by the method should compatible with the `WAVEFORMATEX` available under SAPI.
trans-unit.target: Strukturen som brukes som `waveHeader` og returnert av metoden skal kompatibel med den `WAVEFORMATEX` tilgjengelig under uspesifiserte ISAPI.

trans-unit.source: The `struct` must provide functionality equivalent to: ``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```
trans-unit.target: Den `struct` må angi funksjonalitet tilsvarer:``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> instances containing the text to be rendered into speech.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> forekomster som inneholder teksten som skal gjengis i tale.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> pointing to a structure containing audio output format.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> peker til en struktur som inneholder lyd output-format.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til en <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> grensesnittet sendt inn av plattformen-infrastruktur for å gi tilgang til ressurser infrastruktur.
